Description: Postcard; printed paper; hand coloured photograph showing a general view of the mosque and madrassa of Sultan Hassan and the mosque of Muhammad Ali.
Curator's comments: Old card; postally used; postmarked Egypt 25th January 1908. The message reads: "Hope you are having better weather now it is so cold here from Egypt but the sun is shining beautifully good bye with love DN"
Associated places: Topographic representation of: Sultan Hassan Mosque
